metadata.title: CVE-2019-18848 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
The json-jwt gem before 1.11.0 for Ruby lacks an element count during the splitting of a JWE string.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-18848` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-json-jwt - 1.11.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-json-jwt package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.11.0-1').
